data.title: California Teaching Fellows Foundation - Home
data.meta_description: Providing school districts and school sites with fully-trained college students who serve as role models, tutors and activity leaders supporting expanded learning programs for K-12 students since 1999.
data.text:
Providing school districts and school sites with trained college students and future leaders who serve as role models, tutors, and activity leaders supporting expanded learning programs for K-12 students since 1999.

The Commission on California Teacher Credentials suggests that if our state wants to keep pace with the rest of our nation in teacher quality, diversity, and classroom ratios, schools must hire another 100k teachers. Let's build together the next generation of teachers and leaders for our children.

Please consider becoming a Teaching Fellow, hiring Teaching Fellows, or donating to CTFF to support the Teaching Fellows cause.
